revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Ruins of Alph |image = [[File:Ruins of Alph.png|thumb]] |caption = A map of the Ruins of Alph. |tokens = 3,000 |location = South of Violet City, on Route 32. }} '''Ruins of Alph''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Johto]]. It initially has 36 tiles arranged in a 6x6 square, including 6 chest tiles, 15 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 60,600 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Poliwag.png|40px]] Poliwag || rowspan=7|[[File:Psychic_(male).png|40px]] Psychic Nathan || rowspan=7|[[File:Girafarig.png|40px]] Girafarig |- | [[File:Poliwhirl.png|40px]] Poliwhirl |- | [[File:Magikarp.png|40px]] Magikarp |- | [[File:Natu.png|40px]] Natu |- | [[File:Wooper.png|40px]] Wooper |- | [[File:Quagsire.png|40px]] Quagsire |- | [[File:Smeargle.png|40px]] Smeargle |- |}
===Boss Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[Ruins of Alph#Unown Encounters in Ruins of Alph|Unown (A) -> Unown (Z)]] || rowspan=7|<center>280,000 || rowspan=7 colspan=3|<center>N/A |- |} ''Note: Unown A will be the Boss of this Dungeon until you Catch it''
==== Unown Encounters in Ruins of Alph ==== 25 Unown Forms (A-Z, excluding E - seen below) can be found in Ruins of Alph as Dungeon Bosses. One Unown form per day is randomly chosen to be the boss (switches at midnight).
[[File:Unown_(A).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(B).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(C).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(D).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(F).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(G).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(H).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(I).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(J).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(K).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(L).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(M).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(N).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(O).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(P).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(Q).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(R).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(S).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(T).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(U).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(V).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(W).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(X).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(Y).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(Z).png|30px]]
==Items==
===No Debuff===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Oran}} || 2 || 29.99% || 28.80% || 24.00% |- | {{Bag2|Greatball}} || N/A || 14.99% || 14.40% || 12.00% |- | {{Bag2|Pecha}} || N/A || 14.99% || 14.40% || 12.00% |- | {{Bag2|Sitrus}} || N/A || 14.99% || 14.40% || 12.00% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Blue Shard}} || N/A || 10.00% || 10.50% || 12.47% |- | {{Bag2|Green Shard}} || N/A || 10.00% || 10.50% || 12.47% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Leppa}} || N/A || 4.01% || 5.20% || 10.00% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Small Restore}} || 2 || 0.66% || 1.06% || 2.66% |- | {{Bag2|Star Piece}} || N/A || 0.33% || 0.53% || 1.33% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Mythic''' |- | {{Bag2|Large Restore}} || N/A || 0.01% || 0.11% || 0.53% |- | {{Bag2|Max Revive}} || N/A || 0.01% || 0.11% || 0.53% |}
===Debuff Drop Table===
After Reaching Unova, the drop chance for items in Johto will be debuffed for any loot with weight < 2.
{| class="wikitable collapsible collapsed" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Oran}} || 2 || 30.00% || 30.00% || 30.00% |- | {{Bag2|Greatball}} || N/A || 15.00% || 15.00% || 15.00% |- | {{Bag2|Pecha}} || N/A || 15.00% || 15.00% || 15.00% |- | {{Bag2|Sitrus}} || N/A || 15.00% || 15.00% || 15.00% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Blue Shard}} || N/A || 12.00% || 12.00% || 12.00% |- | {{Bag2|Green Shard}} || N/A || 12.00% || 12.00% || 12.00% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Leppa}} || N/A || 0.90% || 0.90% || 0.90% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Small Restore}} || 2 || 0.07% || 0.07% || 0.07% |- | {{Bag2|Star Piece}} || N/A || 0.03% || 0.03% || 0.03% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Mythic''' |- | {{Bag2|Large Restore}} || N/A || <0.01% || <0.01% || <0.01% |- | {{Bag2|Max Revive}} || N/A || <0.01% || <0.01% || <0.01% |}
